text: "And Samuel called on the Lord," it is said, "and the Lord gave forth His voice, and rain in the day of harvest."[fn-86-P8606_2398082:47-nf] Do you see that "He who sendeth His rain on the just and on the unjust"[fn-86-P8607_2398175:48-nf] by the subject powers is the one God? And the whole of our Scripture is full of instances of God, in reference to the prayers of the just, hearing and performing each one of their petitions.
title: Book VI.
author: Clement of Alexandria
